Description:
Detects when the policy allowing forks of private and internal repositories is changed (enabled or cleared).


Author: Romain Gaillard (@romain-gaillard)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Github Fork Private Repositories Setting Enabled/Cleared
Query: sourcetype='github-audit' eql select * from _source_ where (action = 'private_repository_forking.clear' or action = 'private_repository_forking.enable')
